title: NA to BR (original location)
body:
Hi guys, i'm brazillian and this one was my first league of legends account, I would like to know if Riot Games can give me one transfer to my original country, I have good memories with this account and I wish that I could use it at my original region with a good ping, right now I don't have the NA client and a long time ago I heard that ppl had win a transfer to they original locations, I know that I missed the date, but I would be very glad   
if you guys could do it to me!!!

replies.body: We haven't had free transfers available for a while.  They are very rare, and I've only seen them come up when a new region becomes available and not as sales or prizes.  An account can transfer to another region through the in-game store, but we can't bypass the cost.  Hope that helps clear things up, and I wish you the best with whichever region you choose!
